attributes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overridden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropriate to concatenate
behavior.
attributes.name: Crowdsale
TokensPurchased

attributes.documentation:
@dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
Note that other contracts will transfer fund with a base gas stipend
of 2300, which is not enough to call buyTokens. Consider calling
buyTokens directly when purchasing tokens from a contract.
@return the token being sold.
attributes.name: token

attributes.documentation: @return the address where funds are collected.
attributes.name: wallet

attributes.documentation: @return the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.
attributes.name: rate

attributes.documentation: @return the amount of wei raised.
attributes.name: weiRaised
buyTokens
_preValidatePurchase
_postValidatePurchase
_deliverTokens
_processPurchase
_updatePurchasingState
_getTokenAmount

attributes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.
attributes.name: _forwardFunds

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
attributes.name: IERC20
SafeERC20
ReentrancyGuard

attributes.documentation:
@dev Prevents a contract from calling itself, directly or indirectly.
Calling a `nonReentrant` function from another `nonReentrant`
function is not supported. It is possible to prevent this from happening
by making the `nonReentrant` function external, and make it call a
`private` function that does the actual work.
attributes.name: nonReentrant
